Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Division. Shuttle buses are available from Forest Park to Damen to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to an injured customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to an injured customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
